verses.verse: And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon thy <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and I will speak with <S%H1696>thee<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into me when he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H5975>me<s%>, and set me upon my <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> him that spake unto <S%H1696>me<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, I <S%H7971>send<s%> thee to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H4775>rebellious<s%>, which have <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against <S%H1>me<s%>: they and their fathers have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me even unto this <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> are <S%H7186>impudent<s%> and <S%H2389>stiffhearted<s%>: I do <S%H7971>send<s%> thee unto <S%H559>them<s%>; and thou shalt say unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H8085>they<s%>, whether they will hear, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear<s%>, (for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>,) yet shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that there hath been a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H3372>them<s%>, neither be afraid of their <S%H1697>words<s%>, though <S%H5621>briers<s%> and <S%H5544>thorns<s%> are with <S%H3427>thee<s%>, and thou dost dwell among <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>: be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H1697>words<s%>, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>looks<s%>, though they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, whether they will hear, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear<s%>; for they are most <S%H4805>rebellious<s%>.

But <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> what I <S%H1696>say<s%> unto <S%H1961>thee<s%>; be not thou <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> like that <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: <S%H6475>open<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> that which I give <S%H5414>thee<s%>.
And when I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H3027>behold<s%>, a hand was <S%H7971>put<s%> forth unto <S%H4039>me<s%>; and, lo, a roll of a book was <S%H5612>therein<s%>;

And he <S%H6566>spread<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3789>me<s%>: and it was written <S%H6440>within<s%> and <S%H268>without<s%>; and there were <S%H3789>written<s%> therein <S%H7015>lamentations<s%>, and <S%H1899>mourning<s%>, and <S%H1958>woe<s%>.
